sense.def:
To deceive someone
pomeni povzročiti, da nekdo verjame nekaj neresničnega.

seg.quote: His unkempt appearance deceived the staff into believing that he was a student.

sense.def:
To deceive oneself
pomeni ne priznati si nekaj, za kar vemo, da je resnično.

seg.quote: They try to deceive themselves that everything is all right.
